J

jar(File) - Method in class edu.rit.pj2.Job
Set the JAR file that contains the class files needed by this job and its tasks.
jar() - Method in class edu.rit.pj2.Job
Get the JAR file that contains the class files needed by this job and its tasks.
jar - Variable in class edu.rit.pj2.tracker.TaskInfo
Java archive (JAR) containing task's class files, or null if none.
JarClassLoader - Class in edu.rit.pj2
Class JarClassLoader provides a class loader that obtains class files from a byte array holding the contents of a Java archive (JAR) file.
JarClassLoader(byte[]) - Constructor for class edu.rit.pj2.JarClassLoader
Construct a new JAR class loader.
JarClassLoader(ClassLoader, byte[]) - Constructor for class edu.rit.pj2.JarClassLoader
Construct a new JAR class loader with the given parent class loader.
Job - Class in edu.rit.pj2
Class Job is the abstract base class for a PJ2 job.

Construct a new job.

JobReceiver - Class in edu.rit.pj2.tracker
Class JobReceiver provides a thread that receives messages from a Job.
JobReceiver(ReceiverListener, JobRef) - Constructor for class edu.rit.pj2.tracker.JobReceiver
Construct a new job receiver.
JobRef - Interface in edu.rit.pj2.tracker
Interface JobRef specifies the interface for invoking a Job.

Class JobSender provides an object for sending messages to a Job.
